thread.title: Rob Parsons
thread.title_full: The Shower Doctor Ltd reviewed by Rob Parsons

author: Rob Parsons
title: Rob Parsons
text:
Brought a shower head about 8 months ago and this is now faulty. Rang Shower Doctor who sent a replacement immediately and a prepaid envelope to return faulty one. Delivery next day, customer service team really polite. Will use these again....can't fault the level of service.
Thanks!
